Package com.autonomy.aci.client.util

Utilities for use with and used by the API.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AciParameters Deprecated
    Prefer ActionParameters instead
    AciURLCodec
    Implements the 'www-form-urlencoded' encoding scheme, also misleadingly known as URL encoding.
    ActionParameters
    Utility class to make it easier to specify sets of ActionParameter objects for sending with ACI actions.
    DateTimeUtils
    This utility class contains methods that are used by some the the APIs processors that need to convert date strings into Date objects.
    EncryptionCodecUtils
    This is a utility class that encrypts and decrypts String objects, it main function is to hide the required conversions between strings and byte arrays.
    IOUtils
    Contains some IO utilities that are used by the API.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    AciURLCodecException
    Thrown when the AciURLCodec has encountered a failure condition during an encode or decode.

Package com.autonomy.aci.client.util Description

Utilities for use with and used by the API.
